languages.text: Ксеноартефакт в форме призмы, выполненный из черного металла, наощупь удивительно холодный. Странное устройство не имеет швов, кнопок или отверстий.

traits.locale_text: Ксеноартефакт в форме призмы, выполненный из черного металла, наощупь удивительно холодный. Странное устройство не имеет швов, кнопок или отверстий.

languages.text: This prism-shaped xeno-artefact is made from a black metal that is oddly cold to the touch. The strange device has no visible seams, buttons, or holes.
languages.original_text: Ксеноартефакт в форме призмы, выполненный из черного металла, наощупь удивительно холодный. Странное устройство не имеет швов, кнопок или отверстий.

traits.locale_text: This prism-shaped xeno-artefact is made from a black metal that is surprisingly cold to the touch. The strange device has no visible seams, buttons, or holes.
This prism-shaped xeno-artefact is made from a black metal that is surprisingly cold to the touch. The strange device has no visible seams, buttons, or holes.
This prism-shaped xeno-artefact is made from a black metal that is oddly cold to the touch. The strange device has no visible seams, buttons, or holes.
This prism-shaped xeno-artefact is made from a black metal that is oddly cold to the touch. The strange device has no visible seams, buttons, or holes.
This prism-shaped xeno-artefact is made from a black metal that is oddly cold to the touch. The strange device has no visible seams, buttons, or holes.
This prism-shaped xeno-artefact is made from a black metal that is oddly cold to the touch. The strange device has no visible seams, buttons, or holes.

languages.text: このプリズムのような形をした異種族のアーティファクトは、触ると妙に冷たい黒い金属でできている。この奇妙な装置には、縫い目もボタンも穴もない。
languages.original_text: This prism-shaped xeno-artefact is made from a black metal that is oddly cold to the touch. The strange device has no visible seams, buttons, or holes.

traits.locale_text: このプリズムのような形をした異種族のアーティファクトは、触ると妙に冷たい黒い金属でできている。この奇妙な装置には、縫い目もボタンも穴もない。

languages.text: 这个棱柱状的异形造物由某种黑色金属制成，触感莫名地阴冷。装置表面没有任何可见的接缝、按扣或洞。
languages.original_text: This prism-shaped xeno-artefact is made from a black metal that is oddly cold to the touch. The strange device has no visible seams, buttons, or holes.

traits.locale_text: 这个棱柱状的异形造物由某种黑色金属制成，触感莫名地阴冷。装置表面没有任何可见的接缝、按扣或洞。

languages.text: Este xenoartefacto con forma de prisma está hecho de un metal negro extrañamente frío al tacto. El extraño artefacto no tiene costuras, botones ni agujeros visibles.
languages.original_text: This prism-shaped xeno-artefact is made from a black metal that is oddly cold to the touch. The strange device has no visible seams, buttons, or holes.

traits.locale_text: Este xenoartefacto con forma de prisma está hecho de un metal negro extrañamente frío al tacto. El extraño artefacto no tiene costuras, botones ni agujeros visibles.

languages.text: Dieses prismaförmige Xeno-Artefakt besteht aus einem schwarzen Metall, das sich eigenartig kalt anfühlt. Das seltsame Gerät hat keine sichtbaren Spalte, Tasten oder Löchen.
languages.original_text: This prism-shaped xeno-artefact is made from a black metal that is oddly cold to the touch. The strange device has no visible seams, buttons, or holes.

traits.locale_text: Dieses prismaförmige Xeno-Artefakt besteht aus einem schwarzen Metall, das sich eigenartig kalt anfühlt. Das seltsame Gerät hat keine sichtbaren Spalte, Tasten oder Löchen.

languages.text: Cet étrange artefact xénos en forme de prisme a été forgé dans un métal noir qui demeure froid au toucher. Vous n'y décelez aucune soudure, aucun bouton, ni aucun trou.
languages.original_text: This prism-shaped xeno-artefact is made from a black metal that is oddly cold to the touch. The strange device has no visible seams, buttons, or holes.

traits.locale_text: Cet étrange artefact xénos en forme de prisme a été forgé dans un métal noir qui demeure froid au toucher. Vous n'y décelez aucune soudure, aucun bouton, ni aucun trou.

languages.text: Dokunulduğunda enteresan derecede soğuk bir his veren, siyah bir metalden yapılma, prizma şeklindeki zeno eseri. Tuhaf aygıtın görünürde herhangi bir ek yeri, düğmesi veya deliği bulunmuyor.
languages.original_text: This prism-shaped xeno-artefact is made from a black metal that is oddly cold to the touch. The strange device has no visible seams, buttons, or holes.

traits.locale_text: Dokunulduğunda enteresan derecede soğuk bir his veren, siyah bir metalden yapılma, prizma şeklindeki zeno eseri. Tuhaf aygıtın görünürde herhangi bir ek yeri, düğmesi veya deliği bulunmuyor.
